tool_description: The Face Comparison API, designed to compare two images: a source image and a target image. Its primary functionality is to determine whether the face present in the source image appears in the target image.
name: Face Comparison API
title: Face Comparison API

api_list.name: Analyze Image - Face Comparison
api_list.description:
# Face Comparison API Documentation

The Face Comparison API allows you to compare two images and determine whether the face present in the source image appears in the target image. This API provides information about the matching results, including the location and size of the matched face bounding box in both the source and target images.

## Request

To compare two images, make a POST request to the base URL with the following JSON payload:

```json
{
  "source": "<bytes array of the source image>",
  "target": "<bytes array of the target image>"
}
```

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                                        |
|-----------|--------|----------------------------------------------------|
| source    | string | The byte array of the source image.                 |
| target    | string | The byte array of the target image.                 |

## Response

The API response will contain information about the face comparison results. Here is an example response:

```json
{
  "match": true,
  "source-face-box": {
    "top": 64.9225,
    "left": 48.082916,
    "width": 111.41937,
    "height": 127.93174
  },
  "matched-bounding-boxes": [
    {
      "top": 85.47699,
      "left": 348.71643,
      "confidence": 99.99976,
      "width": 109.530334,
      "height": 125.67253
    }
  ],
  "unmatched-bounding-boxes": [
    {
      "top": 273.8303,
      "match-percentage": 7.781982421875E-4,
      "left": 459.89166,
      "width": 110.2511,
      "height": 121.745026
    },
    {
      "top": 289.86597,
      "match-percentage": 0.00246429443359375,
      "left": 630.5685,
      "width": 101.02124,
      "height": 101.984375
    },
    {
      "top": 274.24442,
      "match-percentage": 3.96728515625E-4,
      "left": 282.23914,
      "width": 102.11569,
      "height": 130.6792
    },
    {
      "top": 146.34964,
      "match-percentage": 4.0435791015625E-4,
      "left": 536.6181,
      "width": 100.2146,
      "height": 99.492065
    }
  ]
}
```

### Response Fields

| Field                  | Type    | Description                                                                 |
|------------------------|---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| match                  | boolean | Indicates whether the face in the source image appears in the target image. |
| source-face-box        | object  | The bounding box coordinates of the face in the source image.                |
| matched-bounding-boxes | array   | An array of bounding box objects for matched faces in the target image.      |
| unmatched-bounding-boxes | array   | An array of bounding box objects for unmatched faces in the target image.      |

#### source-face-box

| Field  | Type   | Description                          |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------------|
| top    | float  | The top coordinate of the bounding box.    |
| left   | float  |

 The left coordinate of the bounding box.   |
| width  | float  | The width of the bounding box.             |
| height | float  | The height of the bounding box.            |

#### matched-bounding-boxes and unmatched-bounding-boxes

| Field             | Type    | Description                                             |
|-------------------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------|
| top               | float   | The top coordinate of the bounding box.                      |
| left              | float   | The left coordinate of the bounding box.                     |
| confidence        | float   | The confidence score of the matched bounding box.             |
| width             | float   | The width of the bounding box.                               |
| height            | float   | The height of the bounding box.                              |
| match-percentage  | float   | The percentage of the bounding box that matches the source face. |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/analyze/image/compare.html"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://face-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/analyze/image/compare.html"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-comparison-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
